comment: Immediately, you taste fire, followed by a full flavored, spicy, rich taste. Wow! I’m going in for the second taste and then...third...

No age listed (6 barrel blend)

Smell: oak, sweet spice, caramel, red fruit
Taste: strong floral, balanced smoke and oak
Feel: warm arrival, strong throat
Finish: long and strong, nice afterbreath

4.0/5.0

“Such a delicious oak flavor and promising finish.”
Very good. Subtle spicy, good sweetness. One of my faves.

Great nose, with classic caramel but also floral honey and a slight vegetal note. Strong leather on the palate, sharp and chalky. Cacao nibs as well. Not as sweet as the nose suggests. Dry finish that lingers. Nice warmth. 10/18/18
